title: Pavement dwellers and hutment dwellers in the slum on land required for vital public purpose or such location which are otherwise unsuitable for human habitation or where there is any restriction shall not be rehabilitated in-situ but in other available location and in accordance with the Scheme
clause_text: Pavement dwellers and hutment dwellers in the slum on land required for vital public purpose or such location which are otherwise unsuitable for human habitation or where there is any restriction shall not be rehabilitated in-situ but in other available location and in accordance with the Scheme.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
